name: Knight_Errant_Beta
description:
Project made by students as a 2nd-year final project.

Controls:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Dash - Space

Pick upgrades: E

Upgrades Info - Tab

Pause - Esc

Credits:

Character models, builders and props made by: https://www.artstation.com/ericvalls

Protagonist animations made by:  https://www.artstation.com/marck_d

Environmental textures, props, and enemy animations by me: https://www.artstation.com/protomar
